LanguageData.Make_Wort.label: make barley wort
LanguageData.Make_Wort.description: Make wort from barley and hops for beer.
LanguageData.RC2_Make_WheatWort.label: make wheat wort
LanguageData.RC2_Make_WheatWort.description: Make wort from wheat and hops for ale.
LanguageData.RC2_Make_OatWort.label: make oat wort
LanguageData.RC2_Make_OatWort.description: Make wort from oats and hops for stout.
LanguageData.RC2_Make_AppleMust.label: make apple must
LanguageData.RC2_Make_AppleMust.description: Make must from apples for cider.
LanguageData.RC2_Make_HoneyMust.label: make honey must
LanguageData.RC2_Make_HoneyMust.description: Make must from honey for mead.
LanguageData.RC2_Make_FruitMust.label: make fruit must
LanguageData.RC2_Make_FruitMust.description: Make must from fruit for fruit wine. Cannot be made with pecans or breadfruit.
LanguageData.RC2_Make_GrapeMust.label: make grape must
LanguageData.RC2_Make_GrapeMust.description: Make must from grapes for wine.
LanguageData.RC2_Make_RiceMash.label: make rice mash
LanguageData.RC2_Make_RiceMash.description: Make mash from rice for sake.
LanguageData.RC2_Distill_Tequila.label: distill tequila
LanguageData.RC2_Distill_Vodka.label: distill vodka
LanguageData.RC2_Distill_Rum.label: distill rum
LanguageData.RC2_Distill_Whiskey.label: distill whiskey
LanguageData.RC2_Distill_Brandy.label: distill brandy
LanguageData.RC2_Make_GinPrecursor.label: make gin precursor
LanguageData.RC2_Make_GinPrecursor.description: Make gin precursor from juniper berries and vodka.
LanguageData.RC2_Make_MoonshinePrecursor.label: make moonshine precursor
LanguageData.RC2_Make_MoonshinePrecursor.description: Make moonshine precursor from corn mash and chemfuel. Corn mash is made in a whiskey barrel.
LanguageData.RC2_Distill_Moonshine.label: distill moonshine
LanguageData.RC2_Distill_Arrack.label: distill arrack
LanguageData.RC2_Make_Grog.label: make grog
LanguageData.RC2_Make_Grog.description: Water down some rum to make Grog. Makes 4.
LanguageData.RC2_Make_Everclear.label: distill rectified spirits
LanguageData.RC2_Make_AmbrosiaMust.label: make ambrosia must
LanguageData.RC2_Make_KumisMust.label: make kumis must
